entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DOTNET_EnableDiagnostics=0 disables profiling in .NET 8 #96227
  • .NET 8 ReadyToRun regression bug: TypeLoadException #96225
  • [Fuzzlyn] Assert failure "SanityCheck()" on OS X ARM64 #96224
    9.0.0
  • HttpClient: Deadlock in `SendAsync` when `AllowDuplex` is true under specific conditions #96223
  • string.IndexOf(string) poor performance in other cultures #96221
  • Potential Deadlock When Disposing EventListeners Concurrently #96219
  • ISerializable documentation claims it works with XmlSerializer #96218
  • [API Proposal]: Enable Convert.ChangeType null conversion to Nullable<T> value type #96216
  • Pauseless Garbage Collector (Question) #96213
  • FilesystemWatcher ObjectDisposedException at the ConfigurationBuilder.Build() on the WinForms project .net8 #96212
  • SqlServer.Types is 20% slower on .NET 8 #96211
  • Executing http request in node-wasm does not work anymore #96210
  • Support Tar with large entry size #96209
  • Unix Console SetWindowSize implementation #96208
  • [AssemblyLoadContext]: Restriction dlls for new Plugins #96207
  • String comparison regression bug #96205

Closed

  • Performance decrease when using interfaces #7291
    Future
  • [wasm] AOT: `System.Globalization.Calendars.Hybrid.WASM.Tests` and `System.Globalization.Hybrid.WASM.Tests` getting terminated #94225
  • JIT: Missing zero initialization of stackallocs converted to locals for "init mem" mismatches during inlining #95056
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT stackalloc returning garbage in AggressiveInlining method #96174
    9.0.0
  • Unnecessary call to `CORINFO_HELP_RNGCHKFAIL` with subtraction and bitwise and #96046
    9.0.0
  • DllImport with SuppressGCTransition causes PAL_SEHException with a hosted runtime in release configuration. #94029
  • ilc.exe is not passed arguments #95997
  • Set up illink test jobs #12914
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] No usable version of libssl was found on linux-bionic-arm64 #96184
  • GC kicks in too late, eventually leads to OOM in Linux #12738
    Future
  • Introduce default value for OptimizationPreference #92312
  • .NET7 NativeAOT worked for us right before updating today to .NET8, now NativeAOT is breaking on an error. #94744
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Intrinsify typeof(T).IsPrimitive #96226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Explicit zeroing for stackalloc if inlined into a caller without LocalsInit #96220
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Tweak new API template #96217
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Enable more MT PLinq areas #96215
    area-System.Linq.Parallel
  • Add Arm64 encodings for SVE IF_SVE_CQ_4A_A & IF_SVE_GE_4A group #96214
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Revert "Revert "Error out if SelfContained is not specified for Native AOT publish"" #96206
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Small tweak for branch optimizer #95740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Temporarily disable PerfBDN app testing on main #96222
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • superpmi: fix failureLimit #96202
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] [PERF] Update osx.1015 queue to osx.13 queue. #96149
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] [PERF] Update osx.1015 queue to osx.13 queue. #96148
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [aot][browser] Stop throwing in CultureInfo getter #95910
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Explicit zeroing for stackalloc if inlined into a caller without LocalsInit #96180
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: remove bound check for negated ranges #96123
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Manually optimize a rem 64 instruction to avoid regression on Mono #96203
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, runtime-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix unhandled exception with no managed frames #96138
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] introduce JSProxyContext #95959
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][browser] Fix WASM README path #96198
    area-Build-mono
  • Longer item expiry for debug builds in System.Runtime.Caching.Tests #96186
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, community-contribution

Updated

  • [RISC-V] Simplify codegen for div/mod #96068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add runtime module address to SpecialDiagInfo block in createdump and fix missing DotNetRuntimeDebugHeader export #96121
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Fix ProcessWaitingTests.WaitChain and ProcessWaitingTests.Wa… #96187
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, test-enhancement, community-contribution, arch-riscv, 9.0.0
  • Fix `CopyStringDictionary` #96093
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • New exception handling diagnostic fixes #96065
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64: Add IF_SVE_DT_3A, IF_SVE_DU_3A, IF_SVE_DX_3A, IF_SVE_DY_3A #96201
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix crash when processing aliases that do not point at names #96048
    area-System.Text.Json, source-generator
  • Various no-diff cleanups and debugging additions/fixes #96200
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merge remaining JIT tests #94444
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Reduce use of madvise DODUMP/DONTDUMP #95643
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Replaced string concatenation by StringBuilder usage #95760
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Implement more APIs in new TypeBuilder, fix bugs found during testing #95753
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [ILLink analyzer] Move generic parameter analysis to dataflow #95482
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono] Adding osx-arm64 Mono Interpreter runtime tests job to extra-platforms #96023
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • A few optimizations for the gcinfodecoder construction #96150
    tenet-performance, area-VM-coreclr
  • Arm64: reduce switch sizes in emitIns_R_R_R #96192
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Support library mode with NativeAOT on iOS-like platforms #93658
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser] Document `DebuggerSupport` for non-debug configurations #95262
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Console.Unix: fix ANSI colors over redirected standard output. #95654
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix bug in label printing in disasm #96136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use a sorted module order for metadata generation #96168
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Make sorting of modules more stable in the compiler #96167
    Servicing-consider, area-crossgen2-coreclr
